content: Nail magazine X-M40 B4 packed ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Accessories for tools > Accessories for direct fastening- ### FEATURES:Features Allows for a range of different nail lengths and number of nails Easy attachment to fastening tool Applications Nail magazines to equip BX 4 nailers for fastening with collated nails Auto-feeds strips of 30 or 40 collated nails into the BX 4 The M30L magazine (#2431981) is mandatory when using X-C 32 B4 and X-C 39 B4 The M30XL magazine (#2431818) is mandatory when using X-C 45 B4 ### TECHNICAL DATA: For use with (tools): BX 4-22 Technical Data | For use with (tools) | BX 4-22 ### ITEMS- 2431819 - Nail magazine X-M40 B4 packed - Package Size 1 pc
